title: Barbecue Boneless Pork Ribs
directions: Combine pork and barbecue sauce in large baking dish. Turn ribs to coat with sauce. Cover and refrigerate 4 hours.
Prepare barbecue (medium-high heat). Grill pork until cooked through, basting with sauce, turning occasionally, about 18 minutes. Transfer to platter. Sprinkle with green onions and serve
ingredients: 1 1/4 pounds lean boneless pork ribs (cut from loin), well trimmed
